item.title: XLops & LBops: Utility Functions for Excel/VBA and LibreOffice Basic/Calc
item.description: While I primarily have been focusing on my current employment and freelance projects, I also have made incremental changes to existing packages/repos on my GitHub. In particular, I have renamed VBAops to XLops, which serves as the primary repo where I will write and maintain utility functions for Excel and VBA. Similarly, LBops contains similar modules for LibreOffice Basic/Calc. Modules FunText: Functions for parsing text. FunDates: Functions for parsing dates.
